title: The Meeting
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Morten Parker and John Howe
brief_description: A discussion film designed to raise questions about how much support an elected group should be entitled to expect from its electorate. At a meeting of a community group, a committee, delegated to choose a play to be staged, makes its choice known. A split occurs when some disagree and it seems that the committee may be overruled.
